mapper.select: SELECT BSS_ITEM.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, BSS_ITEM.BARCODE AS BARCODE, BSS_ITEM.ITEM_NM_C AS ITEM_NM_C, BSS_ITEM.BCNC_SE AS BCNC_SE, ISNULL(CONVERT(DECIMAL(17, 0), MTL_INVNTRY.INVNTRY_QY) ,0) AS INVNTRY_QY FROM BSS_ITEM FULL OUTER JOIN MTL_INVNTRY ON BSS_ITEM.ITEM_CODE = MTL_INVNTRY.ITEM_CODE WHERE BSS_ITEM.BARCODE = #{barcode}
